overview: On Christmas Eve afternoon, Hania waits for her dad to come back from work. When Hania returns from shopping, she finds a mysterious bag and hides it in the backyard's closet. After a while, she meets a black man in royal clothes. He recognizes King Belshazzar, who lost the gift he was carrying. Hania decides to keep King Belshazzar in her room.
